introduce_product: From BABY-G, the casual watch for active women, comes a collection of new models in the same colors as the models created for the TEAM G-SHOCK of top athletes. The yellow with white accent coloring of this newest BGD560 model creates a design in the image of a thunderbolt. The face and EL LCD image also have a lightning and the band is imprinted with the words “ABSOLUTE TOUGHNESS,” which is part of the G-SHOCK basic concept of constantly meeting new challenges.
